text: U ewan (herdukan) dane berhev (heya ber) deri (reviyane. Jinike para da bi kirase wi girt) cirand u ewan herduk li bal deri raste mezine jinike hatin. Jinike (ji bona mezine xwe ra aha) gotiye: "Celata wi kese, ku bive sikati bi maliyen te ra bike, ji pestire ku bikebe zindane u ya ji bi sapateke dilsoz be sapatkirine, tu tist nine
